en.\u043a\u043b\u0438\u043a \u043f\u043e \u: clicking on the line will open the user profile
en.\u0434\u043b\u044f \u043f\u043e\u0438\u0: to search start typing e-mail or last name
en.\u0437\u0430\u0434\u0430\u0442\u044c \u0: you can set the position of the user on the "users" tab
en.\u0443 \u043a\u0430\u0436\u0434\u043e\u0: each user can have multiple positions
en.\u043d\u0430\u0437\u043d\u0430\u0447\u04: appointment of a leader and deputy in the "users" tab
en.\u043f\u043e\u043b\u044c\u0437\u043e\u04: a user without a position is a client, otherwise our employee
en.\u043d\u0430\u0437\u043d\u0430\u0447\u04: appointment of a director and deputy in the "users" tab
en.\u0434\u043e\u043b\u0436\u043d\u043e\u04: position is a set of "roles", access to something
en.\u0420\u043e\u043b\u044c - \u043f\u0440\: role - grants the right to do something
en.\u0434\u043e\u043b\u0436\u043d\u043e\u04: a position is a set of "roles" - rights to something
en.\"\u0420\u043e\u043b\u044c\" - \u043f\u0: "role" - grants the right to do something
en.\u043e\u0442\u0434\u0435\u043b \u043c\u0: a department can be part of a company or another department
en.\u0440\u0443\u043a\u043e\u0432\u043e\u04: management positions are created automatically when you create a department or company
en.\u0420\u043e\u043b\u0438 \u043c\u043e\u0: roles can only be created by the developer
en.\u043a\u043b\u0438\u043a \u043f\u043e \u: clicking on the line will open the loft profile
en.\u0417\u0430\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u04: fill in: name, phone numbers, metro, city
